Class UserDaoJdbc

  • java.lang.Object
    • lumis.portal.user.UserDaoJdbc
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IUserDao

    public class UserDaoJdbc
extends Object
implements IUserDao
    Implementation of IUserDao based on JDBC.
